title: Which university has the best tesol in England? - Quora
tags: Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages (TESOL)

response.answer_text: Univ of edinburgh. They give you opportunity to visit schools to analyze how they work and the curriculum used in the class. They also offer opportunities to do microteaching while being supervised by professors (so you got feedback). I asked some of my friends in other univs (UCL, sheffield) and most of them did not get this valuable experience.
